channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Another non functioning street light Birnam/Franchise Place., 1st August
item.description:
This one too is also not working.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Briset Way, Finsbury Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light by Franchise place and corner of 18 birnam, 1st August
item.description:
Newly installed street light by new flats on Andover estate (Franchise Place) round corner of 18 Birnam Rd has not been switched inside it was installed almost two years ago. The area is dark.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Andover Road, Finsbury Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: New street lamp has yet to be commisioned, 1st August
item.description:
This street light has been here for almost two years for the newly built council housing at the Andover estate end of Birnam Road but has never worked.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Andover Road, Finsbury Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked chute, front falling off, 1st August
item.description:
Blocked chute for over a week, was attempted to be cleared recently but wasn’t done completely. Front is not falling off the chute and flies are coming out
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Redcar Street, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bus stop / cut down tree, 1st August
item.description:
Again! more rubbish left here. Please could this area be swept, the bottom of the cut down tree is being used as an ashtray, and there's loads of rubbish - it just encourages people to leave their trash here. Please put the bin back!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Salusbury Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Fly-tip Small - Less than one bag

item.title: Always flytipping in this lane ( king William), and load of broken bricks behind fences too, looks a mess, 1st August
item.description:
Can something be done to stop flytipping here? It's a common occurrence but all you do is clear it! (and sometimes that only after a repeat message, and that's all time consuming when running a local business here. ) Its very poor service from RBG.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Orlop Street, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Allsop Place, Marylebone, London

item.title: Litter Bin Full, 31st July
item.description:
On Erith Road at the junction with Barnehurst Road, Barnehurst: Please could you empty the full yellow public litter bin at the Bus Stop.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 290, Erith Road, Barnehurst, London

item.title: Building materials on pavement, 31st July
item.description:
Materials take up half the pavement and together with unrelated 'Diversion' sign cause a significant obstruction. There is no room for a mobility scooter or push-chair to pass.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woolwich Road, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Turney Road SE21 a few yards west of house number 82, 31st July
item.description:
Turney Road SE21 a few yards west of house number 82 ie going towards railway bridge is a Keep Right footpath build out board – said board tagged – check back. Google Streetview show this: https://www.google.com/maps/place/82+Turney+Rd,+London+SE21+7JH/@51.4469103,-0.0950622,3a,75y,199.75h,88.32t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1ss7U8uSm5U5qByCoW_kvuVQ!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D1.6760117927064044%26panoid%3Ds7U8uSm5U5qByCoW_kvuVQ%26yaw%3D199.7502625843107!7i16384!8i8192!4m6!3m5!1s0x4876040a1e723d87:0x1938510a42874511!8m2!3d51.4467772!4d-0.0948397!16s%2Fg%2F11c2f8545n?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDcyOS4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 82, Turney Road, Dulwich Village, London

item.title: Litter, broken swing, plastic chair discarded, 31st July
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wordsworth Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Baby in a basket (doll), 31st July
item.description:
Flytipling on daily basis now. Just keep picking up after them. No fines. Why does anyone bother paying for waste collection when flytipping is this easy.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet
